name: The Hallway (Half-Storm Interactive)
description:
RUN IN FULL SCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE!

Navigate the traditional Japanese home and avoid the Onryo at all costs!

WASD to move.

F to toggle light.

Collect Salt bags to protect yourself from the Onryo.

Your light can give your position away!

Blue candles will protect you from the Onryo.

Find the prayer beads and Escape!
